backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types, maps, and CRUD-related state for jobs, candidates, clients, interviews, and user profiles with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI crash fixes and backend data consistency checks along with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend React components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, favicon, root div, and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration and root component handling authentication, profile setup, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component showing an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header displaying branding, user profile info, role label, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper composing header, sidebar, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation listing all main routes with active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Gatekeeper component that blocks access until identity and profile are loaded, falling back to login or loader.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state display with optional illustration, icon, and action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: A dialog component that collects name and email, then saves the user's profile using a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query keys for users, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor methods for fetching and mutating user profiles, jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateC: Form page to create a new candidate, validate inputs, submit via mutation, and redirect to the detail page.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateD: Displays detailed candidate info with status, contact data, job link, and navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/CandidateE: Loads an existing candidate, pre-fills a form for editing, validates input, updates via mutation, and redirects back to details.
frontend/src/pages/candidates/Candidates: Lists all candidates with search, status filter, actions to view/edit/delete, and a button to create new candidates.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientCreateP: Form page for creating a new client with validation, staffing requirements handling, submission, and redirect to client detail.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientDetailP: Displays full client details, status, contact info, and staffing requirements with navigation and job opening badges.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientEditPag: Provides a form to edit client information and staffing requirements, handling validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientsListPa: Shows a searchable and filterable client list with actions for viewing, editing, and deleting clients.
frontend/src/pages/clients/components/St: Allows adding, editing, and removing staffing requirement strings in a form-friendly UI.
Displays staffing requirements in a simple list or an empty-state card when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard that aggregates stats for jobs, candidates, interviews, and clients, with navigation shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewC: Form for scheduling a new interview, validating inputs and submitting interview creation.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewD: Shows detailed interview info including candidate, job, status, type, and notes with navigation to edit.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/InterviewE: Loads an interview, populates a form for editing, validates inputs, and submits updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/interviews/Interviews: Displays a filterable list of interviews with status badges and supports deleting interviews.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobCreatePage.ts: Provides a form to create a new job opening with validation and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed information about a job opening, including client info and status, with a link to edit.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobEditPage.tsx: Loads an existing job opening into a form, allows editing fields, and submits updates.
frontend/src/pages/jobs/JobsListPage.tsx: React page listing job openings with search, status filters, navigation, and delete handling with confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with a styled UI.
frontend/src/utils/candidateStatusPresen: Maps candidate status values to presentation objects defining badge variant and label with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/optionalSelect.ts: Provides sentinel-based helpers for handling optional shadcn Select values without using empty-string items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including feature requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and version state.
